purpleculture_pinyin:
zhū
twenty-fourth part of a tael (2 or 3 grams)
двадцать четвертая часть таэля (2 или 3 грамма)
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 銖)
Pictophonetic: 朱 indicates the sound; 钅 (metal) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
锱铢必较 [ zī zhū bì jiào ]: to haggle over every cent (idiom)
泰铢 [ tài zhū ]: Thai baht
铢两悉称 [ zhū liǎng xī chèn ]: to be equal in weight; to match in every small detail (idiom)
积铢累寸 [ jī zhū lěi cùn ]: to accumulate bit-by-bit (idiom)
锱铢计较 [ zī zhū jì jiào ]: miserly (idiom)

铢字的基本解释

铢
（銖）
zhū
古代重量单位，二十四铢等于旧制一两（亦有其他说法，标准不一）：铢两（极轻微的分量）。锱铢（古代很小的重量单位。喻极微小的数量）。铢积寸累（l噄 ）（喻一点一滴地积累）。
不锋利：铢钝。

铢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhū］
［《廣韻》市朱切，平虞，禪。］
“铢1”的繁体字。
(1)古代衡制中的重量单位。为一两的二十四分之一。
(2)古代重量以黍为起算物，几黍为一铢，各家所说不同。（1）百黍为一铢。《礼记·儒行》；“雖分國，如錙銖。”孔颖达疏：“十黍爲參，十參爲銖，二十四銖爲兩。”《国语·周语下》：“律度量衡，於是乎出”三国吴韦昭注：“黄鍾之管容秬黍千二百粒。粒百爲銖。”《汉书·律历志上》：“一龠容千二百黍，重十二銖。”（2）九十六黍为一铢。汉刘向《说苑·辨物》：“十六黍爲一豆，六豆爲一銖，二十四銖重一兩。”（3）十黍当一铢。《荀子·富国》：“割國之錙銖以賂之，則割定而欲無猒。”杨倞注：“十黍之重爲銖。”（4）一百四十四粟当一铢。《淮南子·天文训》：“十二粟而當一分，十二分而當一銖，十二銖而當半兩。”参阅清程瑶田《九穀考·铢法起于黍》。
(3)五铢钱的省称。
(4)比喻精细，微小。
(5)钝，不锋利。

铢字的英文翻译

◎ 铢
baht

铢字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　銖； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1328第06
【唐韻】市朱切【集韻】【韻會】慵朱切，?音殊。【說文】權十分黍之重也。一曰十黍爲絫，十絫爲銖。又八銖爲鍿，二十四銖爲兩。又孟康曰：黃鍾一龠容千二百黍，爲十二銖。【禮·儒行】雖分國如鍿銖。　又【博雅】鈍也。【淮南子·本經訓】其兵戈銖而無刃。【註】楚人謂刀頓爲銖。　又姓。【正字通】明弘治舉人銖炫，德興人。　又人名。【前漢·宣帝紀】右賢王銖婁渠堂入侍。【註】銖音殊。

铢字的源字形

铢字的起名意思

我国古代重量单位，二十四铢为一两。后也用于比喻极少。

baht
Basic explanation of words
baht
(baht)
zhū
The ancient weight unit, twenty-four baht is equal to one or two in the old system (there are other sayings, the standard is different): two baht (very slight weight). Qiba (a very small unit of weight in ancient times. Yu is a very small amount). Zhu accumulates inch by inch (l 噄) (Yu accumulate bit by bit).
Not sharp: Shut blunt.
baht
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhū］
["Guangyun" City Zhuqi, Pingyu, Zen. ]
The traditional characters of "Baht 1".
(1) The unit of weight in the ancient weighing system. Twenty-fourth of one or two.
(2) In ancient times, the weight was calculated based on millet, and a few millet was one baht, which is different from each family. (1) One hundred millet is one baht. "Book of Rites·Confucianism"; "Although it is divided into countries, such as Qunba." Kong Yingdashu: "Ten millet is ginseng, ten ginseng is baht, and twenty-four baht is two." "Mandarin · Zhou Yuxia": "Law Weights and Measures" , So almost came out "Three Kingdoms Wu Wei Zhao's note: "Huang Zhongzhi manages the Rongzi millet thousand and two hundred grains. One hundred for the baht." "Han Shu·Lüzhi 1": "One barrel capacity thousand two hundred millet, weighing twelve baht. "(2) Ninety-six millet is one baht. Han Liuxiang "Shuoyuan·Bianwu": "Sixteen millet is one bean, six beans is one baht, twenty-four baht weighs one or two." (3) Ten millet is one baht. "Xunzi·Fu Guo": "Cut the country's baht and baht by bribing it, and then you will cut the land and want to be free." Yang Qi's note: "The weight of ten millet is baht." (4) One hundred and forty-four corns are equivalent to one baht. "Huainanzi Tiantian Xun": "Twelve millet is worth one point, twelve cent is worth one baht, and twelve baht is half two."
(3) The name of the province for five baht.
(4) The metaphor is fine and small.
(5) Blunt, not sharp.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　 Baht; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 1328 06
[Tang Yun] City Zhu Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Zhu Qi,? Yin Shu. [Said the text] Power is very important. One said that ten millet is 絫, and ten 絫 is baht. Another eight baht is 鍿, and twenty-four baht is two. And Mengkang said: Huang Zhong has a capacity of one thousand two hundred millet, which is twelve baht. 【Rite·Confucianism】Although it is divided into countries, it is like Ning Ba.　[Bo Ya] Blunt. 【Huainanzi·Ben Jingxun】He has a warrior and no blade. [Note] Chu people say that the knife is the baht.　Another last name. 【Zhengzitong】Ming Hongzhi Juren Zhuxuan, from Dexing.　Another name. [Previous Han·Xuan Di Ji] Youxian Wang Zhu Lou Qu Tang served as a servant. [Note] Zhu Yinshu.
baht
Source glyph
baht
Name meaning
A unit of weight in ancient my country, twenty-four baht is one or two. The latter is also rarely used as a metaphor.
形声字。金(年)表意,表示和金属或货币有关;朱(zha )表声。形旁简化。铢是古代重量单位,二十四铁为一两。
古代重量单位,一两的二十四分之一:餾~必较(形容非
常计较,不大方)|~两悉称(指两方面轻重相当或优劣相
同)|~积寸累(一点一点地积累)。

I сущ./счётное слово
1) * чжу (мера веса; 1/24, позже 1/48 ляна); ничтожный вес
2) бат (денежная единица Таиланда, по старому названию тикал)
